commands.name: az storage file metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the file.
commands.syntax:
az storage file metadata show --path
                              --share-name
                              [--account-key]
                              [--account-name]
                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--backup-intent]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                              [--file-endpoint]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--snapshot]
                              [--timeout]
examples: az storage file metadata show -s MyShare --path /path/to/file

                              --share-name

                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--backup-intent]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--snapshot]
                              [--timeout]
examples: az storage file metadata show -s MyShare --path /path/to/file

commands.name: az storage file metadata update
commands.syntax:
az storage file metadata update --path
                                --share-name
                                [--account-key]
                                [--account-name]
                                [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                [--backup-intent]
                                [--connection-string]
                                [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                                [--file-endpoint]
                                [--metadata]
                                [--sas-token]
                                [--timeout]
examples: az storage file metadata update -s MyShare --path /path/to/file --metadata key1=value1
